title: Niobrara National Scenic River: General Management Plan
body: Final General Management Plan       The Final General Management Plan, including the official boundary maps for the scenic river, is available in two options: one large download or multiple smaller downloads. The full plan (13.9 MB) as one download is available here. The Final General Management Plan broken down into multiple links below for easier downloading:   Record of Decision   Table of Contents, Purpose of and Need for the Plan, Foundations of the Plan   Resource Assessment, National Scenic River Outstanding Values   Management Alternatives - text   Boundary Alternative Maps   Environmental Impacts   Coordination   Final Boundary Maps   Section I. Western Boundary - Smith Falls   Section II. Brewer Bridge - Rocky Ford   Section III. Muleshoe Creek - Smith Creek   Section IV. Smith Creek - Meadville   Section V. Meadville - Carns   Section VI. Carns - East Boundary
